uvi.description:
misc/libmasm/module: Fix two use after free in ibmasm_init_one

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.240 by commit 5b06ca113bf197aab2ab61288f42506e0049fbab. For more details please see the references link.
